ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depends on the situation. To this day I still haven t expiereneced the rush I get from killing a certain room or mobs on my necro that I shouldn t be
ygData.messageBody:
It all depends on the situation. To this day I still haven't expiereneced
the rush I get from killing a certain room or mobs on my necro that I
shouldn't be able to do even as a necro. People used to laugh at me and my
necro friends when we had told them diffrent things. One track or not it
takes skill to solo 5 lower guk mobs at once solo. Then after that to solo
some mob that can wack for 115 and heal.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Brangwen <brangwen@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 06, 2000 1:29 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]


>> Enchanters and Bards are the most situation adapative classes and
>> that makes them the hardest to teach correct gameplay. All the
>> other classes are one or two tracked minded with very little
>> strategy based thinking.
>>
>> Harmonic.
>
>Aye.... When I get tired of having to think... I play my warrior - Whack,
>Thump, Bash, Kick :) wheeeeee!!
>
>Brangwen Incantare
>L24, wood elf lady bard, The Rathe
